title: LUQI Group
text:
Research
Our research tackles uncertainty quantification in complex systems arising in computational science and engineering. Our approach involves integrating generative modeling and scientific computing to develop scalable sampling techniques for high-dimensional distributions. This work enables Bayesian inference in large-scale PDE-based inverse problems (e.g., seismic and medical imaging) and provides a principled approach to designing reliable, uncertainty-aware AI models for real-world applications.

title: LUQI Group
